name: Adomo Health
description: Adomo Health enables doctors to conveniently send advanced diagnostic testing such as x-ray, ultrasound, and EKG to be done on-demand in patients' homes, reducing the need for unnecessary emergency room visits.
one_liner: Adomo Health enables doctors to conveniently send advanced diagnostic testing such as x-ray, ultrasound, and EKG to be done on-demand in patients' homes, reducing the need for unnecessary emergency room visits.
location: New York City, New York, United States
